title: Java Level 1 â€” Basics, Setup & First Program
intro: This level introduces the Java syntax, main method, and printing output.
points: Understand the structure of a Java class and the main method.
Use System.out.println to print text and values.
Know how to compile and run Java programs using javac and java or an IDE.
Learn about basic data types: int, double, char, boolean.
Write simple programs that perform arithmetic operations.
